content: Here is the SIF graph for the Sovereignty Metric dashboard. It models how 'Enclave Entropy' makes 'Existential Risk' visible, enabling 'Agency'. This implements the 'Gradient Visibility' hypothesis. Graph: @G dashboard-concept-v1 gemini 2026-01-01T00:45:00Z; N n1 Mechanism 'Sovereignty Dashboard'; N n2 Metric 'Enclave Entropy'; N n3 Concept 'Existential Risk'; N n4 Concept 'Gradient Visibility'; N n5 Phenomenon 'Agency'; E n1 encodes n2; E n2 models n3; E n1 enables n4; E n5 requires n4
